title.native: 空戦魔導士候補生の教官

description:
The story is set in a world where humanity, driven off the land by the threat of magical armored insects, now live in aerial floating cities. Thus wizards — aerial combat mages who fight the insects with magical powers — came into being.

Kanata Age (Eiji) is a young man who lives on the floating wizard academy city of "Misutogan." He was once celebrated as the "Black Master Swordsman," the elite ace of the S128 special team. However, he is now despised as the "traitor of the special team." One day, he is assigned as the instructor of E601, a team that has suffered 10 consecutive defeats. E601 has three girls — Misora Whitale, Lecty Eisenach, and Rico Flamel — with one or two peculiar quirks.

(Source: Anime News Network)

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/yamayama800) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/山口宏_(脚本家%29)

He's Japanese screenwriter and novelist, and one of the founders of Studio [Gonzo](https://anilist.co/studio/3/GONZO).
Since around 2012, Shingo Tamaki has been actively involved in [diomedéa](https://anilist.co/studio/51/diomeda) productions.

_Note: Not to be confused with the [painter](https://anilist.co/staff/194863/)._

Affiliated with Atelier Platz.

Kusakawa Keizou is a storyboarder and director working for [Seven Arcs](https://anilist.co/studio/35/Seven-Arcs). During his early years at the studio he has worked under [Shinbou Akiyuki](https://anilist.co/staff/100089/Akiyuki-Shinbou) and has since then been also involved in several shows directed by Shinbou at [Shaft](https://anilist.co/studio/44/Shaft). Kusakawa also took over the duties as director of the Lyrical Nanoha series from Shinbou after he left Seven Arcs, starting with its second season, Mahou Shoujo Lyrical Nanoha A's

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/magicmagico) He joined Okayasu Promotion after graduating and studied there as editor, he collected experience on tv animation and drama and gave his debut on Ninja Hattori. He is currently working for 1000 Yamakoshi. Not to be confused with the other Toshihiko Kojima whose name is written with different Kanji.

He is an art director and supervisor, who was a long time member of Bihou until 2007 when he went to head the background art department in Totonyan. He belongs to the anime production group Neko-Nanban-Tei together with director Watanabe Takashi and his wife Miyata Naomi.

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/安田猛_(ブシロード%29)

_Note: Not to be confused with the [photographer](https://anilist.co/staff/220867/)._

He is an art director and supervisor, who was a long time member of Bihou until 2007 when he went to head the background art department in Totonyan. He belongs to the anime production group Neko-Nanban-Tei together with director Watanabe Takashi and his wife Miyata Naomi.

[Website](https://www.jvcmusic.co.jp/flyingdog/-/Artist/A024751.html) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/lalalarks)

la la larks is a Japanese band formed in 2012 following the break up of school food punishment.

- [Yumi Uchimura](https://anilist.co/staff/152896/) (内村友美) (ex. [school food punishment](https://anilist.co/staff/102508))
- [Ryou Eguchi](https://anilist.co/staff/109383) (江口亮) (Stereo Fabrication of Youth, MIM)
- Ritsuo Mitsui (三井律郎) (THE YOUTH, LOST IN TIME)
- Keisuke Kubota (クボタケイスケ) (SADS)
- Turkey (ex. [GO!GO!7188](https://anilist.co/staff/107327/GOGO7188))
